Name: Lamont Undersuit
Description:
Item Type: Flight Suit
Damage Reduction: 10%

The Lamont looks so good you won't want to wear armor over it. Seamlessly blending lightweight plating with durable synthetic weaves, the Lamont will be as comfortable in the cockpit as it is stylish in the streets. Embrace personal protection gear suitable for both work and play, and gain the Hardin Tactical advantage.
